In next year or two there will be stored muon beam at ~3 GeV/c in the storage ring with ~60 meters long straits (Debuncher ring as g-2 delay beam line).
In next year or two there will be stored muon beam at ~3 GeV/c in the
storage ring with ~60 meters long straits (Debuncher ring as g-2 delay
beam line).
detector, 10 meters downstream from the one ring’s straits, running for 10^7 sec Booster at 3 Hz, 8 GeV beam(5x10^12 protons per pulse) and storing muons for 100 turns.
detector, 10 meters downstream from the one ring’s straits, running for
10^7 sec Booster at 3 Hz, 8 GeV beam(5x10^12 protons per pulse) and
storing muons for 100 turns.
point.
point.
same target and using ICARAUS (600 ton) detector for 2x10^7 seconds (Fermilab year) will create 40000 CC neutrino events.
same target and using ICARAUS (600 ton) detector for 2x10^7 seconds
(Fermilab year) will create 40000 CC neutrino events.
All this is for investment of ~10M$ in building to house detector and willingness to move ICARUS detector in suggested location!
All this is for investment of ~10M$ in building to house detector and
willingness to move ICARUS detector in suggested location!

page.title:
Motivation
Motivation
page.enlisting:
• Measure neutrino cross-section with better than 10% • Utilize existing detectors (MicroBooNE, ICARUS) • Minimize initial investment. Providing a suitable building to house the detector would be the only investment required • Describe possible improvements in collecting and storing • Provide a suitable test facility for future NF • Measure neutrino cross-section with better than 10%
• Measure neutrino cross-section with better than 10%
• Utilize existing detectors (MicroBooNE, ICARUS) • Minimize initial investment. Providing a suitable building to house the detector would be the only investment required • Describe possible improvements in collecting and storing

muons that would allow cross-section measurements with a precision of a few percent with a modest additional investment.

page.title:
Questions ?
Questions ?
page.normal_text:
nuSTORM can be moved to Muon Campus and there are two options. Depending what is distance needed to far detector we can use CDF or D0 Building to house far detector.
nuSTORM can be moved to Muon Campus
and there are two options. Depending what
is distance needed to far detector we can use
CDF or D0 Building to house far detector.

page.title:
If Far Detector is in CDF
If Far Detector is in CDF
page.normal_text:
In this case A0 and CDF buildings can be used for detectors. Distance To CDF is 1.5 km. Blue box is near detector used initially. The red lines are nuSTORM upgrades.
In this case A0 and CDF buildings
can be used for detectors. Distance

detector used initially. The red lines are
